.. currentmodule:: wx.lib.pubsub.core.topicexc

.. _wx.lib.pubsub.core.topicexc.TopicDefnError:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.pubsub.core.topicexc.TopicDefnError**
==========================================================================================================================================

Raised when an operation requires a topic have an MDS, but it doesn't. 
See also pub.setTopicUnspecifiedFatal().



|

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: TopicDefnError(RuntimeError)

   Raised when an operation requires a topic have an MDS, but it doesn't. 
   See also pub.setTopicUnspecifiedFatal().
